TopicTitle: What parts packs do you use for your Space Stations?

Articles.Content: The Fustek Modules have a nice aesthetic to them.
I use mainly any part made for space stations I like changes, sometimes I use real world part others I use fantasy parts, whatever the mood wants.

The Fustek Modules have a nice aesthetic to them.

Yeah, I use it too. Is nice to have so much modules to play with.

I use mainly any part made for space stations I like changes, sometimes I use real world part others I use fantasy parts, whatever the mood wants.

Yeah, Ã‚Â¿and where do you get them? I only know 2 packs right now, KOSMOS and FusTek.
Fustek is my choice, and the Large Station Structure pack adds some nice options too.
the updated Bace inflatable modules. The MK2 (2.5 meter compacted, 3.75 expanded) is great for a core area.

My mod of choice for space stations is Large Structural/Station Component by udk_lethal_dose. These just look soooo good. Fustek parts are great, but to... clean for my liking.
